jobs_results.title: Software Engineer (iOS)
jobs_results.description:
A****bout the role

We are looking for iOS Software Engineer with mid/senior-level technical skills and experience to join our client in the Banking/Financial sector to work on new application development projects. You will join a distributed multicultural team of engineers working on high-impact projects and join. Also, in this role, we will invite a new colleague to come to the client's office 3 times a week.

What you will do
• Design and develop iOS applications, ensuring high performance, responsiveness, and reliability
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features
• Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency
• Maintain and improve existing codebases and peer review code changes
• Troubleshoot and debug to optimize performance
• Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and emerging mobile technologies

Skills and qualities we appreciate
• Proven experience as an iOS Developer with a strong portfolio of applications developed
• Proficiency in Swift and Objective-C
• Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle
• Experience working with remote data via REST and JSON
• Knowledge of code versioning tools, such as Git
• Strong problem-solving skills and a passion for quality and performance
• Excellent communication and teamwork skills
• Self-motivated with the ability to work independently and as part of a team
• Willingness to adapt to new technologies and learn continuously
• Additionally, native environment development and Kotlin experience would be nice have

What we offer
• Hybrid working model (*) and flexible working schedule
• Private Health Insurance
• 20 vacation days, increasing according to labour law
• Extensive cafeteria package
• People Lead system for your personal development
• A culture of continuous growth, providing various training resources
• Referral System
• Technical equipment you can choose
• Agile mindset, simplified processes, and a great atmosphere where commitment and autonomy are celebrated
• A community-first mindset working with talented people across technology products and consulting

(*) This role requires working for a couple of days on-site in the client's office.

About us

Zenitech is a leading technology solutions provider dedicated to reshaping the global digital landscape. Headquartered in the UK, Zenitech operates internationally, with offices in Lithuania, Romania, and Hungary. We use a bespoke approach depending upon where the client is on their digital journey, comprising a combination of access to dedicated R&D labs, technology implementation advice, and specialist nearshore development talent. As an international community of individuals who are open to learn from each other, we collectively define and input into the digital future of the clients’ businesses.

Why Zenitech?

Impactful Projects: Drive meaningful change in Banking/Financial industry through digital transformation projects.Collaborative Culture: Be part of a diverse, inclusive team committed to growth, innovation, and continuous learning.Professional Growth: Zenitech supports continuous learning and development, helping you advance your skills and career.

Diversity and Inclusion

Zenitech celebrates diversity in all its forms. We aim to create an inclusive environment where everyone feels valued for their unique contributions and perspectives. If you require any adjustments during the application process, please let us know—we’re here to help.

jobs_results.title: Mobile Developer - iOS - Support Tribe
jobs_results.description:
Wise is one the fastest growing companies in Europe and we’re on a mission: to make money without borders the new normal. We’ve got 10 million customers across the globe and that number is growing. Fast.

Current financial systems don’t let us send, spend or receive money across borders easily. Or quickly. Or cheaply.

So, we’ve been building a new one.

We are looking for experienced iOS engineers at all levels to join our mission and help provide our customers with the best mobile experience possible.

We work in small, autonomous cross-functional teams. Team members own the problems and provide best in class solutions for our customers.

The Operations team at Wise behind the scenes makes using Wise a world class experience. Still there are some problems along the way that our users may encounter and will need our help to solve it. In this team, Getting Help, you are going to focus on understanding those problems in order to find ways and build features that either eliminate those problems or help customers solve it on their own seamlessly and instantly. You will be working across all our core products (account, transfers, cards, platform, business) in this pursuit of making using Wise completely effortless.

What does it take?
• Experience with building iOS apps that delight users
• Thinking from the customer perspective and putting them at the heart of everything you do
• A passion for product quality and user experience, attention to detail
• Knowledgeable about product engineering (or have the desire to learn it) <https://tech.transferwise.com/product-engineering-principles-transferwise/>
• Ability to both collaborate effectively with your team and solve problems independently and proactively
• Great communication skills and the ability to articulate complex, technical concepts to non-technical audiences
• Full-stack iOS development (we work in small teams, each with one or two mobile engineers, it’s likely you’ll be in charge of a feature from API to UI)
• Know SOLID ways to implement clean architecture, writing readable code that is testable (we currently work with VIPER but are continuously evaluating the latest architectures/methodologies - SwiftUI and Combine are nice to have)
• We value experience with state-of-art technologies, but we value eagerness to learn them even more

What the first six months look like?
• You’ll have on-boarded and found your place by understanding your team and guild vision and how you can contribute
• You’ll have an understanding of your team’s domain and our tech culture
• You’ll have fully shipped new features, from planning to release, and kept monitoring their adoption once live
• You’ll have gone through two quarterly plannings and proposed ideas to take our product further

What you get back?
• The autonomy to solve problems your way
• The freedom to have real impact
• Loads of development opportunities
• A fun work environment with social activities and events

And more… Check out our offer here.

Interested? Find out more:
• How we work - a practical guide
• TransferWise Vlogs: Omar, Engineering Lead
• Engineering team blog
• How our Engineers build new features

We’re people without borders — without judgement or prejudice, too. We want to work with the best people, no matter their background. So if you’re passionate about learning new things and keen to join our mission, you’ll fit right in.

Also, where and what you studied isn't important to us. If you’ve got great experience, the right skills for the role and you’re great at articulating your thinking, we’d like to hear from you.

#LI-ZK1

jobs_results.title: Senior Software Engineer, iOS
jobs_results.description:
• Architect and develop features for the iOS platform of a live-streaming product
• Work in a multicultural environment with teams in multiple geographical locations
• Investigate and resolve application issues, bottlenecks, and inefficiencies
• Demonstrate strong communication, analytical, and problem solving skills
• Collaborate with backend developers to succeed
• Keep up with new tech and capabilities and seek for high quality
• Get all resources, but need to write high-quality code, on-time
• Give and receive feedback
• Do peer code reviews

• 5+ years of experience in mobile native development
• Good sense of structured and readable code
• Swift is a must
• Strong experience in building iOS applications, iOS SDKs, provisioning and the whole toolchain
• Proven understanding of how to produce efficient and thread safe concurrent code
• Solid understanding of platform specific design patterns (MVC, MVVM, VIP)
• Experience with popular frameworks like Alamofire, Moya, Realm
• Experience with reactive programming (RxSwift, Combine)
• Experience with Instruments
• Experience in mobile video streaming is plus
• Strong knowledge in using source control (Git)
• Strong communication skills in English is a must for being able to collaborate with remote team members

• Exceptional Salary Package
• Professional challenges
• Working in a creative and innovative environment with amazing colleagues
• High degree of independence, rapid professional development
• Cafeteria. (gross 500.000 Ft / year)
• Private health insurance (Medicover)
• AYCM sportpass

Byborg Enterprises is an equal employment opportunity employer. We consider individuals for employment based on their skills, abilities and experience. We thrive to attract and hire a strong, talented and diverse workforce, prohibiting discrimination based on race, color, religious or political beliefs, age, nationality, physical, mental or developmental disability, gender, sexual orientation.

DISCLAIMER: This job description is a summary of the primary duties and responsibilities of the job and position. It is not intended to be a comprehensive or all-inclusive listing of duties and responsibilities. Contents are subject to change at management's discretion.

NOTE: Byborg Enterprises SA does not accept unsolicited resumes from agencies. We consider any resume (CV) or biography received from an agency without prior approval from our Legal and Recruiting Department to be unsolicited, and such submissions will not be recognized for purposes of “ownership” of the candidate.

We are in it for the long haul so your future is safe with us.

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Developer - Spanish/English - Full Remote
Mobile Application Developer (iOS/Android)
jobs_results.description:
Szenvedélyed a mobilfejlesztés és olyan lehetőséget keresel, ahol munkáddal valódi értéket teremthetsz?

Akkor nálunk a helyed! Csapatunk tagjaként olyan alkalmazásokon dolgozhatsz, amelyet több millió felhasználó használ majd, és részt vehetsz küldetésünk megvalósításában: visszaadni az állampolgároknak az időt, hogy azzal foglalkozhassanak, ami igazán fontos számukra. Olyan rendszereken dolgozhatsz, amelyek célja, hogy a digitális ügyintézés folyamata gyorsabbá, biztonságosabbá és felhasználóbarátabbá váljon – mindezt személyes megjelenés nélkül, akár a fotel kényelméből.

Ki is vagy Te?
• Nyitott és rugalmas gondolkodású szakember vagy, aki szeretné biztosítani, hogy a projektek gördülékenyen haladjanak.
• Kiváló szervezőkészséged és precizitásod segítenek a hatékony munkavégzésben.
• Otthonosan mozogsz a gyorsan változó technológiai környezetben, és mindig készen állsz az új kihívásokra.
• Szenvedélyesen érdeklődsz a mobilfejlesztés iránt, és nyitott vagy az új trendek felfedezésére.

Ami Rád vár
• Multiplatform mobilalkalmazások tervezése, fejlesztése natív technológiák használatával, amelyekkel több millió felhasználó mindennapjait könnyítheted meg.
• Közreműködés modern, felhőalapú infrastruktúrára épülő fejlesztésekben.
• Szoros együttműködés több csapaton átívelően, közös eseményeken és projektcélok elérése érdekében.
• Szoros együttműködés UX/UI és service design csapatainkkal a lehető legjobb felhasználói élmény és service-oriented fejlesztési megoldások érdekében.
• Aktív részvétel agilis tervezési és becslési folyamatokban, valamint a technikai megvalósításokban, egyéni és csapat szintű fejlesztések során.

Amit keresünk
• Legalább 5 év mobilfejlesztési tapasztalat,
• Natív fejlesztési tapasztalat iOS-re (Swift) vagy Androidra (Java/Kotlin),
• Multiplatform/cross-platform fejlesztésben szerzett gyakorlat,
• Jártas vagy az agilis módszertanok alkalmazásában (Scrum, Kanban),
• Proaktív hozzáállással és csapatjátékos mentalitással rendelkezel,
• Naprakész vagy a legújabb mobil app fejlesztési trendekkel és technológiákkal kapcsolatban.

Aminek örülünk, de hiánya nem kizáró ok
• Flutter vagy React Native ismerete.

Miért érdemes csatlakozni hozzánk?
• Inspiráló, támogató és innovatív munkakörnyezet, ahol a kreativitásodat értékeljük.
• Lehetőség a szakmai fejlődésre és új technológiák megismerésére.
• Olyan csapat része lehetsz, amely elkötelezett a minőség és a kiválóság iránt.
• Lehetőség arra, hogy olyan alkalmazást fejlessz, amelyet több millió ember használ nap mint nap, és amely valódi hatást gyakorol a mindennapi életükre.

Kiválasztási folyamatunk:
• Kötetlen beszélgetés recruiter kollégánkkal, ahol lehetőséged nyílik megismerkedni a cégünkkel, a területtel és a pozícióval.
• Szakmai beszélgetés a leendő közvetlen vezetőddel és a csapat vezető fejlesztőjével, akik szakmai szempontból felmérik, mennyire felelsz meg az adott pozícióra, és hogyan illeszkednél a csapatunkba.

Fontos számunkra, hogy megtaláljuk azt a kollégát, aki nemcsak szakmailag, hanem emberileg is jól illeszkedik hozzánk. Várjuk jelentkezésedet, és reméljük, hogy hamarosan találkozhatunk!

Mindezért mit kínálunk mi?

„Életre szóló” projekteket

Olyan létfontosságú informatikai rendszereket fejlesztünk és üzemeltetünk, amelyek az összes magyar állampolgár életét befolyásolják.

Nekünk köszönhető például:
• az, hogy ma már online bejelenthető a lakcím és más adatok változása,
• az, hogy kényelmesen, otthonról intézhető a jogosítvány újraigénylése,
• az, hogy házasságkötési névváltoztatásnál automatikusan történik az új okmányok elkészítése,
• a chippel ellátott eSzemélyi igazolvány, amelyet többek között a TAJ kártya, vagy közúti igazoltatás során a jogosítvány helyett is felmutathatunk.

Biztonságot és kényelmet
• Rendszereink jellege garantálja, hogy a munkádra ugyanakkora szükség lesz holnap, mint tegnap.
• Irodaházunkban, a 2020-ban átadott Váci Greens „E” épületében letisztult, „zöld” környezet vár modern és kényelmes berendezésekkel, magas színvonalú felszereléssel. Mélygarázsunk a bringákkal és elektromos rollerekkel is jó barátságot ápol.
• A home office-ra természetesen nálunk is lehetőség van.

Fejlődési, tanulási lehetőséget
• Kiemelt figyelmet fordítunk a vertikális és horizontális mozgás lehetőségének biztosítására, illetve arra, hogy kollégáink minden támogatást megkapjanak a pozíciójuk betöltéséhez.
• Angol nyelvtanulási lehetőséget is biztosítunk.
• Külső és belső tréningeken is részt vehetsz.

Közösséget
• Több önszerveződő klubunk van, amelyek akár a szakmai tudás, akár a kollegiális kapcsolatok továbbfejlesztésére alkalmasak (pl. fejlesztői könyvklub, társasjáték klub).
• Céges sportolási lehetőségek: jóga, futóklub, foci, kosárlabda.
• Rendszeresen tartunk cégen belüli meetupokat és kötetlen találkozókat a szakmai eszmecserékért és a barátságok erősítéséért.

És hogy még egy pár dolgot említsünk
• All You Can Move
• Cafetéria
• Autóval munkába járó kollégáinknak – törvényi szabályozás szerint – a jelenlegi maximális, 30 Ft/km-es költségtérítési támogatás
• Extra családtámogatás: házasságkötési szabadság, gyermekvállalás anyagi támogatása
• Belső ajánlási program
• Irodai masszázs
• Társadalmi felelősségvállalás támogatása: önkéntes munkáért plusz szabadság

jobs_results.title: React Native Developer iOS @ EV INFINITY
jobs_results.description:
Required Qualifications
• 4+ years of experience in mobile application development
• Strong expertise in React Native
• Proficient in Swift and iOS native development
• Solid understanding of mobile app architecture and design patterns
• Experience with state management libraries (Redux, MobX, or Context API)
• Familiarity with RESTful APIs and GraphQL
• Proficiency in TypeScript
• Understanding of iOS UI/UX guidelines
• Experience with mobile app testing and deployment

Technical Skills
• React Native
• Swift
• TypeScript
• iOS SDK
• Xcode
• CocoaPods
• Redux/MobX
• RESTful APIs
• GraphQL
• Firebase/Cloud Services
• Git version control

Nice to Have
• Experience with native module development
• Knowledge of Android development
• CI/CD pipeline experience
• Performance optimization techniques
• Familiarity with app store submission processes

React Native Developer iOS (Mid-Level to Senior)

About the Role

We are seeking an experienced React Native Developer with strong Swift and iOS development skills to join our innovative technology team. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of building high-performance mobile applications and a deep understanding of cross-platform mobile development.

How to Apply

Please submit your resume, portfolio, and GitHub profile to E-mail cím mutatása itt nofluffjobs.com Include links to mobile applications you've developed or contributed to.

EV Infinity is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
,[Design and develop cross-platform mobile applications using React Native, Implement native iOS features and optimizations using Swift, Create efficient, scalable, and maintainable code for mobile applications, Collaborate with product managers, designers, and backend developers to deliver exceptional mobile experiences, Conduct code reviews and mentor junior developers, Optimise application performance and ensure smooth user experiences, Integrate third-party APIs and services, Troubleshoot and resolve mobile application issues, Stay updated with the latest mobile development trends and technologies] Requirements: React Native, iOS, Swift, React, Design Patterns, Redux, MobX, API, REST API, GraphQL, TypeScript, UI, Testing, iOS SDK, CocoaPods, Firebase, Cloud, Git, Android, GitHub, EV

jobs_results.title: Native Mobile Engineer /iOS/ EUROPE CET /Remote/
jobs_results.description:
SEON is the leading fraud prevention system of record, catching fraud before it happens at any point across the customer journey. Trusted by over 5,000 global companies, we combine your company’s data with our proprietary real-time signals to deliver actionable fraud insights tailored to your business outcomes. We deliver the fastest time to value in the market through a single API call, enabling quick and seamless onboarding and integration. By analyzing billions of transactions, we’ve prevented $200 billion in fraudulent activities, showcasing why the world’s most innovative companies choose SEON.

SEON’s Device Intelligence team gathers information on the devices that run our customers’ websites and applications. We analyze hardware, software, and network data to identify fraudsters and malicious behavior. Our research-driven team always seeks new opportunities to improve our fraud detection solution for our customers.

We seek a native Mobile Engineer (iOS) to join our Device Intelligence team. You will contribute to our iOS SDKs, research and develop new features and maintain our current products that help our customers stop fraud.

We expect you to build a scalable, maintainable and automatically testable product. We are looking for someone who enjoys experimenting with mobile development and deeply understands native development, networking and security concepts.

This is a hybrid role and the ideal candidate will be based in Budapest, Hungary.

WHAT YOU’LL DO:
• Research new solutions to identify fraudulent environments and associated devices to prevent fraudulent behavior.
• Analyzing the data created by our products, suggesting internal and external improvements and fixes to our customers.
• Researching fraud and privacy tools to ensure we can detect them and we are aware of the latest trends.
• Keeping up to date with the platforms we are using, to make sure our products are aligned with their requirements.
• Creating technical design based on research results or product requirements.
• Delivering the product by creating high quality code and documentation.
• Implementing unit tests, integration tests, and performance tests to ensure robustness, performance, and reliability.

WHAT YOU’ll BRING:
• 1-2 years of experience in native mobile development (iOS)
• Ability to read, comprehend, and navigate code in various programming languages. (Swift, Objective-C)
• Ability to cooperate with team members (Participate in code reviews, mentoring)
• Out-of-the-box thinking combined with the ability to adapt to a fast-paced environment
• Excellent problem-solving skills

BIG ADVANTAGE IF YOU ALSO HAVE:
• Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle
• Experience in SDK development
• AWS experience
• Understanding of advanced networking and security concepts
• Experience with RESTful APIs
• Experience with automated testing frameworks and tools for mobile applications.

WHAT WE OFFER:
• Employee stock ownership plan (ESOP)
• Flexible hours
• Generous Holiday allowance
• Access to significant opportunities for learning and development
• Private health insurance including dependants (inc. employee assistance & mental health support)
• Complimentary weekly language courses
• Enhanced Parental leave
• Monthly company breakfast and weekly Lunch allowance
• 'Work from anywhere' 60-day remote work
What’s next:

Does that sound good to you? Great, we can’t wait to hear from you! Would you like to learn more about what it’s like to work at SEON first?
👉 Here you go

Original job Native Mobile Engineer /iOS/ EUROPE CET /Remote/ posted on GrabJobs ©. To flag any issues with this job please use the Report Job button on GrabJobs.

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer @ Flexion Mobile Plc Magyarországi Fióktelepe
jobs_results.description:
• Proficiency in Swift or Objective-C.
• Experience with payment SDKs (e.g., Stripe, Apple Pay, or PayPal).
• Familiarity with frameworks like Unity Engine.
• Strong knowledge of RESTful APIs for backend integration.
• Proficiency in Apple’s design principles and interface guidelines.
• Experience with version control tools (Git, Bitbucket).
• Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and performance tuning tools (e.g., iOS Cloud Build, and Unity Cloud Build, Instruments).
• Proven ability to research, explore, and adapt to new technologies with an entrepreneurial mindset.

We are seeking an experienced iOS Developer to play a key role in helping Flexion expand into the iOS ecosystem with a primary focus on payment integration and implementing payment SDKs. You will drive the development of iOS solutions, mirroring the success of our Android products, while developing features, conducting R&D, understanding the full ecosystem, and approaching challenges with an entrepreneurial and doer mindset.

You will also work with frameworks such as Unity Engine to deliver seamless, high-quality solutions. Collaboration with cross-functional teams is essential for success in this role.

jobs_results.title: React Native Mobile Developer (Remote)
jobs_results.via: USNLX Virtual Jobs - National Labor Exchange
jobs_results.description:
Join Us at IQVIA!

We are looking for talented individuals to join our team and help us revolutionize patient care with our electronic clinical outcome assessment (eCOA) platform. Our fast, flexible, and proven solution enhances efficiencies, delivers real-time data, and sharpens insights, all while providing a superior patient experience.

Who we’re looking for:

You will be part of a growing team of developers located across the world, focused on building new and modern software that’s positioned to disrupt the clinical trial space. In this remote role, you’ll be empowered and encouraged to think “outside the box” to develop innovative solutions to drive business and the industry forward. You believe that pushing yourself out of your comfort zone is the only way to grow. You love the idea of owning a product, from developing new mobile app features to scaling to meet market demands. Not only are you fluent with React Native, but you’re an expert with JavaScript/TypeScript.

Position overview:

We’re seeing immense growth in the industry, and our core focus is scaling our native application’s feature set. Bring your talent and drive to our team of passionate, creative, and innovative thinkers, focused on developing a sophisticated product that uses modern JavaScript. We have the support and resources of a large company but operate with a start-up culture. You’ll thrive in a fast-paced and agile environment, during which you see real-time results. As we work to rapidly expand our team, you’ll have the opportunity to grow your career in the direction that’s right for you.

RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Serve as critical development resource on cross platform mobile application
• Work collaboratively and efficiently across functional teams in a fast-paced startup-like environment.
• High standard of engineering quality through source control, code reviews, continuous integration, and unit tests.
• Extend our platform to handle an expanding set of features.
• Improve infrastructure and application development
• Review and refactor legacy code
• Provide input on the establishment of development best practices and standards for the organization

SKILLS:
• Expert in React Native, React, and Redux
• Expert in JavaScript and TypeScript
• Experience with SQL databases (SQLite/Postgres)
• Experience with Swift, Objective-C, Java, and Kotlin are a plus
• Experience with mobile application deployments (Android/iOS)
• Experience with data/event streams (Amazon Kinesis/Apache Pulsar)

IQVIA is a leading global provider of clinical research services, commercial insights and healthcare intelligence to the life sciences and healthcare industries. We create intelligent connections to accelerate the development and commercialization of innovative medical treatments to help improve patient outcomes and population health worldwide. Learn more at https://jobs.iqvia.com

IQVIA is a world leader in using data, technology, advanced analytics, and expertise to help customers drive healthcare – and human health – forward. Together with the companies we serve, we are enabling a more modern, more effective and more efficient healthcare system, and creating breakthrough solutions that transform business and patient outcomes.

To get there, it takes diverse skills and a curiosity to explore new possibilities. No matter your role, everyone at IQVIA contributes to our shared goal of improving human health. Thank you for your interest in growing your career with us.

EEO Minorities/Females/Protected Veterans/Disabled

apply_options.title: USNLX Virtual Jobs - National Labor Exchange

jobs_results.title: Mobile Developer - Flutter
jobs_results.description:
The leading app in the music-tech world is looking for a powerful Mobile Flutter Developer

First things first, if you are looking for a fully remote role with flexible hours, unlimited time off, and are based somewhere in Europe or Asia, read on
About BlueThrone

Embark on a transformative journey with BlueThrone, a pioneer in the mobile app domain.

Our Specialization: Turning B2C mobile apps into market leaders, boasting over 49.5 million downloads and 4.6 million monthly active users.

Our Mission: Propel iOS and Android applications to new heights. We've achieved a remarkable $8M ARR organically in just 25 months, exemplifying sustainable growth and innovation.

Our Team: Rich in tech entrepreneurship and mobile marketing expertise, we thrive in an environment that values agility, growth mindset, flexibility, creativity, and tangible outcomes.

At BlueThrone, your career is more than a job - it's a journey toward excellence in an innovative culture where high performance is as valued as innovation.

About Our Unicorn

You will join one of our shining unicorns: an innovative music analytics mobile platform that has quickly become a staple for music lovers globally.

Our Reach: Launched in 2020, we've organically reached over 20 million users, allowing them to analyze, track, and compare their musical tastes while connecting directly with their favorite artists.

Our Growth: Has been entirely organic, demonstrating strong product-market fit and high user engagement.

Our Coverage: This platform has penetrated 35+ languages and 190+ markets, with a diverse user base and substantial revenue streams.

The Role

We are looking for a Flutter Developer to help build our revolutionary music tech app. This role is not just about coding it's a calling for those who can harmonize technology and music to create seamless mobile experiences.
What are we looking for?
• 5+ years of professional mobile app development experience
• 3+ years building high-quality Flutter apps
• Dart Expertise: Strong knowledge of Dart and its ecosystem
• IDE Proficiency: Skilled with Android Studio and Visual Studio Code
• Architectural Know-how: Experience designing app architecture using patterns like BLoC or Provider
• Firebase Skills: Familiarity with Firebase services is a plus
• Team Player: Comfortable with collaboration and code reviews
• Continuous Learner: Keen to stay updated with new tech trends
• In-App Purchase Experience: Knowledge of implementing in-app purchases in Flutter (desired)
• Cultural Awareness: Experience in multicultural work environments is valued
Things we'll trust you with...
• Async Programming: Handle concurrency using Dart's async features
• Architecture: Build and maintain robust apps using clean, scalable code
• State Management: Implement effective state management solutions
• API Integration: Develop solid networking components for REST APIs
• Quality Assurance: Conduct thorough unit and widget testing
You’ll love it here if:
• You prefer flexible hours, unlimited time off, and the ability to work from anywhere.
• You are naturally curious and eager to drive impact for both users and the business.
• You enjoy wearing multiple hats - we value experts but appreciate jacks of all trades.
• You thrive in a drama-free, calm, and systematic problem-solving environment.
• You love challenges and are always ready to roll up your sleeves.
• You believe in working smarter, not harder - prioritizing productivity and quality over punching the clock.
• Above all, you follow your passion and have fun while doing it.

Equal opportunities for everyone
To truly represent our vibrant and diverse BlueThrone community, we prioritize diversity and inclusion. We are committed to fostering an environment where everyone can do their best work. We strongly encourage applicants of all backgrounds. We consider all candidates regardless of age, ethnicity, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, family or parental status, national origin, veteran status, neurodiversity, or disability. If you need reasonable adjustments at any point in the application or interview process, please let us know.

Join us in a role that's more than a job - it's a chance to be part of a transformative mission propelling mobile apps to unparalleled success.
